sdc.title: Fire in the Hole (2024)
sdc.description: A reimagined indoor mine‑train coaster with modern effects, onboard audio, and splash finale.

sdc.title: Mystic River Falls
sdc.description: River-raft adventure with a rotating elevator lift and the tallest raft-drop in the Western Hemisphere.

sdc.title: Time Traveler
sdc.description: World’s fastest, tallest spinning coaster—with double LSM launches, vertical loop, and 3 inversions.

sdc.title: Outlaw Run
sdc.description: Groundbreaking wood coaster with 162‑ft drop, 3 inversions, and an 81° first drop.

sdc.title: Wildfire
sdc.description: B&M steel coaster featuring 5 inversions and a 155‑ft first drop—set in an 1880s inventor’s lab theme.
